name: COMMERCIAL CLEANING
description: Here’s a scary thought: on average, an office desk contains 400 times more germs than an office toilet seat. If you’re a business owner, the more germs that linger in your building, the more you’re going to have employees calling out sick. And if your building serves customers, then you risk getting them sick too.Of course, you don’t have time to clean the building yourself, so why not turn to a commercial cleaning company instead? Keep reading to learn more about the benefits of hiring a commercial cleaner so you can decide if it’s the right move for your company.

name: Ceiling, Floors, and Wall Cleaning
features: 1. Ceilings and walls are cleaned and restored using the exclusive Commercial Cleaning Services non-toxic, non-flammable, odorless solution that is applied in a very fine mist.
2. Restore the entire ceiling and wall area without dismantling
3. Clean a variety of ceilings and walls including ceramic, vinyl and wallpaper, brick, stone, aluminum, and both flat and gloss paint
4. I can clean all types of surfaces including, grids, vents, and light fixtures
5. Removes odors and does not contain chlorine, bleach, ammonia, or solvents.
6. Sanitizes as it cleans and eradicates bacteria, mold, yeast, and fungi.
